II. Purpose of Addendum
This State of Michigan Child Placing Agency – DHS is currently allocated two
adoption workers and they would like to modify their certificate of approval to have
the adoption terms added as a part of their certificate of approval. The additional
adoption terms would include authority to evaluate families and assess children for
the purpose of adoption and to place and supervise children for the purpose of
adoption.
III. Methodology
A written request for the modification of this certificate of approval was received on
3/20/2006. Supporting documentation of applicable policies and procedures were
also received at that time.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
A written request for the modification of this certificate of approval has been
submitted. This request identified the fact that two adoption workers have been
allocated to provide sufficient staff and supervision for the implementation of the
additional adoption terms. The agency maintains sufficient, proper space to include
the activities related to the additional terms. This agency is also committed to the
policies and procedures related to adoption functions that are already approved for
other DHS Child Placing Agencies for the State of Michigan. Copies of appropriate
program statements and policies and procedures to ensure compliance with
licensing rules related to adoption activities have been submitted. It is the
conclusion of this consultant that this agency is in compliance with all licensing rules
related to the adoption terms that are requested.
V. Recommendation
It is the recommendation of this consultant that the certificate of approval for this
State of Michigan Child Placing Agency – DHS be modified to include the terms of
evaluating families for the purpose of adoption, assessment of children for the
purpose of adoption and the authorization to place and supervise children for the
purpose of adoption.
